title: Smart Door Lock Installation
description: Install a smart door lock with remote access and PIN authentication.
view_details: Secure your home with a tamper-proof smart lock that supports app and keypad access. Ideal for main doors.
process: Fit smart lock base and align mechanism

title: Smart Lock with Video Doorbell
description: A combined smart lock and video doorbell system for added security and convenience.
view_details: Monitor and control your door remotely with a smart lock and video doorbell combo. Ideal for apartments and gated homes.
process: Mount and align smart lock with door
Install video doorbell at eye level
Connect WiFi and pair with mobile app
Test live video and remote unlocking

title: Smart Lock Maintenance & Battery Replacement
description: Routine check-up and battery replacement for your installed smart lock system.
view_details: Keep your smart lock performing reliably with routine servicing, app sync checks, and battery replacements.
process: Check lock for physical wear and tear

title: Smart Lock Home Demo & Consultation
description: Book a home visit for a live demo of various smart locks and personalized security consultation.
view_details: A professional visits your home to showcase smart lock options, explain features, and suggest the best fit based on your door type and usage.
process: Technician arrives with sample smart locks
Demonstration of key features and mobile app
